snippet: An executive order protecting gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender employees from discrimination by companies that do federal government work will not include an exemption sought by many religious groups.
abstract: Pres Obama plans to sign executive order that protects gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender employees from discrimination by companies that do federal government work; directive will not exempt religious groups; order will also, for the first time, explicitly protect federal employees from discrimination on basis of gender identity.
lead_paragraph: An executive order protecting gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender employees from discrimination by companies that do federal government work will not include an exemption sought by many religious groups.

headline.main: Obama to Issue Order Barring Anti-Gay Bias by Contractors
headline.print_headline: Obama Set to Bar Federal Contractors From Anti-Gay Discrimination
